movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

poster.caption: Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin in No Country for Old Men (2007)

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

poster.caption: Janeane Garofalo, Ian Holm, Brian Dennehy, John Ratzenberger, James Remar, Will Arnett, Brad Garrett, Kathy Griffin, Brad Bird, Lindsey Collins, Walt Dohrn, Tony Fucile, Michael Giacchino, Bradford Lewis, Danny Mann, Theodore Newton, Patton Oswalt, Lou Romano, Peter Sohn, Jake Steinfeld, Stéphane Roux, Lori Richardson, Thomas Keller, Julius Callahan, Marco Boerries, Andrea Boerries, and Jack Bird in Ratatouille (2007)

movies.title: I Am Legend
movies.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

poster.caption: Will Smith, Kona, and Abbey in I Am Legend (2007)

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.originalTitle: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.plot: Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann, Hector Barbossa, and the crew of the Black Pearl try and rescue Jack from davy jones locker and prepare to fight Lord Cutler Beckett, who controls Davy Jones and the Flying Dutchman.

poster.caption: Johnny Depp in Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End (2007)

movies.title: Transformers
movies.plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

poster.caption: Peter Cullen, Josh Duhamel, Shia LaBeouf, Mark Ryan, Hugo Weaving, and Megan Fox in Transformers (2007)

movies.title: There Will Be Blood
movies.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

poster.caption: Daniel Day-Lewis in There Will Be Blood (2007)

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movies.originalTitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movies.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

poster.caption: Rupert Grint, Matthew Lewis, Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Bonnie Wright, and Evanna Lynch in Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007)

movies.title: Into the Wild
movies.plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.

poster.caption: Emile Hirsch in Into the Wild (2007)

movies.title: Spider-Man 3
movies.plot: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

movies.title: Superbad
movies.plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

poster.caption: Michael Cera and Jonah Hill in Superbad (2007)

movies.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
movies.plot: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

poster.caption: Matt Damon in The Bourne Ultimatum (2007)

movies.title: Zodiac
movies.plot: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

poster.caption: Robert Downey Jr., Jake Gyllenhaal, and Mark Ruffalo in Zodiac (2007)

movies.title: Juno
movies.plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes a selfless decision regarding the unborn child.

poster.caption: Michael Cera and Elliot Page in Juno (2007)

movies.title: Hot Fuzz
movies.plot: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, all while a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

poster.caption: Nick Frost and Simon Pegg in Hot Fuzz (2007)

movies.title: American Gangster
movies.plot: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas.

poster.caption: Russell Crowe and Denzel Washington in American Gangster (2007)

movies.title: Live Free or Die Hard
movies.plot: John McClane is forced to team up with a young computer hacker, Matt Farrell, to stop a master cyber-terrorist called Thomas Gabriel, who wants to shut down the entire nations computer infrastructure in a mass cyber attack.

poster.caption: Bruce Willis in Live Free or Die Hard (2007)

movies.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
movies.originalTitle: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
movies.plot: The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

poster.caption: Johnny Depp in Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)

movies.title: Knocked Up
movies.plot: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

poster.caption: Katherine Heigl and Seth Rogen in Knocked Up (2007)

movies.title: Ocean's Thirteen
movies.plot: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

poster.caption: Brad Pitt, George Clooney, Don Cheadle, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Casey Affleck, Elliott Gould, Scott Caan, Bernie Mac, Carl Reiner, Eddie Jemison, and Shaobo Qin in Ocean's Thirteen (2007)

movies.title: Shooter
movies.plot: An expert marksman living in exile, is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Now on the run after being double crossed for the assassination attempt he was trying to prevent, he sets out for the real killer, and the truth.

poster.caption: Mark Wahlberg in Shooter (2007)

movies.title: The Mist
movies.plot: After a massive thunderstorm, an eerie, unwavering fog descends upon a Maine community. Locals seek refuge in a grocery store from the monstrous creatures now roaming the countryside killing everyone they encounter.

poster.caption: Thomas Jane and Nathan Gamble in The Mist (2007)

movies.title: The Simpsons Movie
movies.plot: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

poster.caption: Dan Castellaneta in The Simpsons Movie (2007)

movies.title: Shrek the Third
movies.plot: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

poster.caption: Antonio Banderas, Cameron Diaz, Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, and Conrad Vernon in Shrek the Third (2007)

movies.title: 28 Weeks Later
movies.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.

poster.caption: Rose Byrne in 28 Weeks Later (2007)

movies.title: 3:10 to Yuma
movies.plot: A small-time solely rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

poster.caption: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale in 3:10 to Yuma (2007)

movies.title: Death Proof
movies.plot: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

poster.caption: Death Proof (2007)

movies.title: Atonement
movies.plot: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

poster.caption: Keira Knightley and James McAvoy in Atonement (2007)

movies.plot: Author Michael Enslin, who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences, checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel in New York City, settles in, and soon confronts genuine terror.

poster.caption: John Cusack and Samuel L. Jackson in 1408 (2007)

movies.title: Gone Baby Gone
movies.plot: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

poster.caption: Casey Affleck in Gone Baby Gone (2007)

movies.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
movies.plot: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

poster.caption: Laurence Fishburne, Jessica Alba, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans, Ioan Gruffudd, and Doug Jones in Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer (2007)

movies.title: Stardust
movies.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

poster.caption: Claire Danes, Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer, Dexter Fletcher, Rab Affleck, Adam Fogerty, Ricky Gervais, Mark Strong, Charlie Cox, Carlos Peres, Spencer Wilding, Terry Murphy, and Jordan Long in Stardust (2007)

movies.title: Sunshine
movies.plot: A team of international astronauts is sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

poster.caption: Cillian Murphy in Sunshine (2007)

movies.title: Eastern Promises
movies.plot: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

poster.caption: Viggo Mortensen and Naomi Watts in Eastern Promises (2007)

movies.title: Disturbia
movies.plot: A bored teenager under house arrest starts spying on his neighbors and discovers one of them might be a serial killer.

poster.caption: Shia LaBeouf and Sarah Roemer in Disturbia (2007)

movies.title: The Bucket List
movies.plot: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

poster.caption: Morgan Freeman and Jack Nicholson in The Bucket List (2007)

movies.title: Paranormal Activity
movies.plot: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

poster.caption: Katie Featherston and Micah Sloat in Paranormal Activity (2007)

movies.title: Ghost Rider
movies.plot: A motorcycle stuntman who sold his soul becomes a supernatural agent of vengeance.

poster.caption: Nicolas Cage and Eva Mendes in Ghost Rider (2007)

movies.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
movies.plot: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

poster.caption: Nicolas Cage in National Treasure: Book of Secrets (2007)

movies.title: Fracture
movies.plot: After shooting his wife, Ted confesses his crime and asks the court to move his case to trial. He represents himself against Willy, a successful lawyer. But there's more to the case than meets the eye.

poster.caption: Anthony Hopkins and Ryan Gosling in Fracture (2007)

movies.title: Planet Terror
movies.plot: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

poster.caption: Rose McGowan in Planet Terror (2007)

movies.title: Like Stars on Earth
movies.plot: A young boy is thought to be nothing but a lazy troublemaker until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

poster.caption: Aamir Khan and Darsheel Safary in Like Stars on Earth (2007)

movies.title: The Darjeeling Limited
movies.plot: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

poster.caption: The Darjeeling Limited (2007)

movies.title: Enchanted
movies.plot: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

poster.caption: Susan Sarandon, Patrick Dempsey, James Marsden, and Amy Adams in Enchanted (2007)

movies.title: P.S. I Love You
movies.plot: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

poster.caption: Hilary Swank and Gerard Butler in P.S. I Love You (2007)

movies.title: The Number 23
movies.plot: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him, as more and more similarities between himself and his literary alter ego seem to arise.

poster.caption: Jim Carrey in The Number 23 (2007)

movies.title: The Man from Earth
movies.plot: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

poster.caption: The Man from Earth (2007)

movies.title: REC
movies.plot: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

movies.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
movies.plot: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

poster.caption: Milla Jovovich in Resident Evil: Extinction (2007)

movies.title: The Golden Compass
movies.plot: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

poster.caption: Nicole Kidman, Kristin Scott Thomas, Sam Elliott, Ian McKellen, Daniel Craig, Freddie Highmore, Ian McShane, Eva Green, Dakota Blue Richards, Helen Soraya, and Caridad Angus in The Golden Compass (2007)

movies.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
movies.originalTitle: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
movies.plot: Robert Ford, who has idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the resurgent gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

poster.caption: Brad Pitt and Casey Affleck in The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford (2007)
